title: Love of the Game Shameless Plug - my items
author: Blwilson2

posts.post_title: Love of the Game Shameless Plug - my items
posts.post_content:
Just wanted to make you guys aware of some of the cards I have up for sale that I think you would be interested in

Ty Cobb Tolstoi back PSA 2 current bid $1,000
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Tolstoi_Ty_Cobb__HOF___Red_Background-LOT9188.aspx[/url]

Chesbro PSA 4  pretty card current bid $185
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Jack_Chesbro__HOF____PSA_VG_EX_4-LOT9921.aspx[/url]

PSA 4 Portrait Collection PSA 4 (4) Wild Bill Donovan, Fiene Beaumont and Tenney  current bid 200
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_PSA_VG_EX_4_Portrait_Collection__4_-LOT9941.aspx[/url]

HOF Nice and Tougher Backs - Mordecai Brown (2), Willis, Collins, Spade Berger  current bid $250
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Collection_w_HOFers_and_Tougher_Backs-LOT9935.aspx[/url]


Bill Burns PSA 6.5 really pretty card  current bid $275
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Bill_Burns___PSA_EX_MT__6_5-LOT9942.aspx[/url]

Assorted Sovereign Backs (6) current bid $140
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Sovereign_Backs_Collection__6_-lot9934.aspx[/url]

Assorted Polar Bear lot (5)  current bid $130
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_Polar_Bear_Collection__5_-LOT9933.aspx[/url]

scarce Hugh Duffy  EPDG - PSA 1  (1 of 6)  current bid $90
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/1909_11_T206_EPDG_Hugh_Duffy__HOF____1_of_6_graded-LOT9922.aspx[/url]

Lundgren Chicago scarce PSA 2.5  Current Bid $120
[url]http://loveofthegameauctions.com/LotDetail.aspx?inventoryid=9920[/url]

Also some great lower grade HOFers and some PSA 4 PSA 3.5 and PSA 3 groupings for sale that if you haven't you might want to check out

Thanks for looking.

Barry


Thanks for looking
